original_text: Thus I fell down before the Lord forty days and forty nights, as I fell down at the first; because the Lord had said he would destroy you.
korean_text: 그 때에 여호와께서 너희를 멸하겠다 하셨으므로 내가 여전히 사십 주 사십 야를 여호와 앞에 엎드리고

sentences.original_text: Thus I fell down before the Lord

sentences.korean_translation: 사십 일 동안 사십 밤 동안

sentences.original_text: as I fell down at the first
